original_text: And, behold, one of them which were with Jesus stretched out his hand, and drew his sword, and struck a servant of the high priest's, and smote off his ear.
korean_text: 예수와 함께 있던 자 중의 하나가 손을 펴 칼을 빼어 대제사장의 종을 쳐 그 귀를 떨어뜨리니

sentences.original_text: one of them which were with Jesus
sentences.korean_translation: 예수와 함께 있던 자 중의 한 사람이

sentences.original_text: and struck a servant of the high priest's
